title: Velkoz Ult Rework
body:
does anyone know if you cast your new ult before a person is "researched" but they become reaserched while your ult is going off...will the remainder of the ult be true dmg...or must they be completely researched b4 ulting.

Ie...if you land your E W R...but start your ult before the 2nd proc of your w

replies.body: Vel'Koz's ult checks before applying each damage tick to see if the target is researched. In your example there you'd get a brief period of non true damage before the 2nd W hit and then true damage for the rest of the ult against that target.
Do you think if he is to under-powered compared to the other mages you could make the first tick of his ult apply a stack of deconstruction? Or are changes to the ult out of the question?
